cards.name: The Fool
cards.short: REACTION: Draw 2 cards. +2 FP
cards.description:
**REACTION**: *Hidden Ace*

+2 FP to self. If your deck is not empty, you may play this card to instantly draw two cards from your deck.

You may play this card on yourself at any time.

cards.name: The Magician
cards.short: REACTION: Redraw last-played card. +2 FP
cards.description:
**REACTION**: *Sleight of Hand*

+2 FP to self. If your discard pile is not empty, you may play this card to redraw your most-recently discarded card and return it to your hand.

You may play this card on yourself at any time.

cards.name: The Priestess
cards.short: ACTION: Can't lose FP next round.
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Divine Providence*

Target becomes immune to any FP loss on the next round. If Chicanery (The Devil) is used on this card, the targeted player cannot gain FP instead.

You may play this card on any player, including yourself, before the next round begins.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.short: ACTION: Discard random card. -5 FP
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Regal Edict*

-5 FP to target. Target must discard a random card in their hand. The discarded card's effects will not be activated. If Diligence (The Chariot) is used on this card, the discarded card may be redrawn.

You may play this card on any player, including yourself, at any time during the card phase.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.short: REACTION: Trigger conditional effects.
cards.description:
**REACTION**: *Royal Authority*

The next card you play with a conditional effect will be guaranteed to activate its effect, even if its condition is not satisfied.

You may play this card on yourself at any time.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.short: REACTION: Peek next three cards in deck + hand.
cards.description:
**REACTION**: *Clairvoyance*

You may peek at the next three cards of the target's deck, as well as the target's current hand. This card cannot be canceled out by Diligence (The Chariot) or redirected by Nexus (The World).

You may play this card on any player, including yourself, at any time.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.short: REACTION: Pick someone. +4 FP to you/+2 FP to target if both get series points this round.
cards.description:
**REACTION**: *Synergy*

If both you and your target earn points for series this turn, you gain +4 FP and your target gains +2 FP. This card is unaffected by Chicanery (The Devil) and cannot be canceled out by Diligence (The Chariot). Perseverance (Strength) will apply to both you and your target. Only your target can be redirected by Nexus (The World).

You may play this card on another player (not yourself) before you submit your guess.

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.short: REACTION: Cancel the effects of a card played this round.
cards.description:
**REACTION**: *Diligence*

The effects of the targeted card will be canceled out. You may play this card on another Chariot, allowing the original target's effects to persist. This card does not affect Synergy (The Lovers), Lunar Sigil (The Moon), Solar Crest (The Sun), or any cards that can only self-target.

You may play this card on any card played during the round that can target any player, including your own card.

cards.name: Justice
cards.short: ACTION: Makes person lose FP if they made someone else lose FP.
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Retribution*

If the targeted card causes an FP loss, the player who played that card receives the same FP loss. This card cannot be redirected by Nexus (The World). Retribution's effects can be applied to any card affected by Chicanery (The Devil).

You may play this card on any card played during this round with an FP loss effect, including your own card.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.short: ACTION: +5 FP if you weren't targeted last round.
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Elucidation*

If you and your cards were not targeted during the previous round, you may play this card to gain +5 FP. This card is not affected by Chicanery (The Devil).

You may play this card on yourself at any time during the card phase.

cards.name: The Wheel of Fortune
cards.short: REACTION: On next guess, +1 FP for each point.
cards.description:
**REACTION**: *Fortune's Bounty*

Earn FP equal to the number of points you earn from your next guess. While under the effects of Royal Authority (The Emperor), gain the maximum possible FP.

You may play this card on yourself before you submit your guess.

cards.name: Strength
cards.short: REACTION: On FP gain/loss, +3 FP/-3 FP.
cards.description:
**REACTION**: *Perseverance*

If the targeted card causes a direct gain/loss to a player's FP, that player receives an additional +3/-3 FP.

You may play this card on any card played during this round with an FP gain or FP loss effect, including your own card.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.short: ACTION: Next round, +2 FP every time target is targeted by another player.
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Resilience*

On the next round, receive +2 FP whenever the targeted player is targeted by a different player's card. While under the effects of Royal Authority (The Emperor), this card's effect is immediately consumed and grants you +6 FP. The effects of Perseverance (Strength) are applied only once to this card.

You may play this card on any player, including yourself, before the next round begins.

cards.name: Death
cards.short: ACTION: -8 FP to target.
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Stygian Torment*

-8 FP to target.

You may play this card on any player, including yourself, at any time during the card phase.

cards.name: Temperance
cards.short: ACTION: +8 FP to target.
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Fortitude*

+8 FP to target.

You may play this card on any player, including yourself, at any time during the card phase.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.short: ACTION: Inverts FP gain/losses on certain cards.
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Chicanery*

Any FP losses induced by the targeted card become FP gains, and any FP gains become FP losses. You may play The Devil on another Devil to cancel out the effects of the original.

You may play this card on any card played during this round, including your own, but only during the card phase.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.short: ACTION: One person loses -6 FP. Everyone else loses -3 FP.
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Dominion*

Target player loses -6 FP, and all other players lose -3 FP. Chicanery (The Devil) and Perserverance (Strength) affects all targets. Nexus (The World) can only redirect the primary target, making the original target receive -3 FP instead. Retribution (Justice) will cause this card's owner to receive -4 FP.

You may play this card on any player, including yourself, at any time during the card phase.

cards.name: The Star
cards.short: REACTION: Draw a card if nine cards have been played this round. +3 FP
cards.description:
**REACTION**: *Constellation*

If nine or more cards have been played this round, you may play this card to draw a card from your deck and gain +3 FP. You may play this card instantly while under the effects of Royal Authority (The Emperor). This card is not affected by Chicanery (The Devil).

You may play this card on yourself after nine or more cards have been played in the current round.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.short: ACTION: Target draws one less card next round. -3 FP
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Lunar Sigil*

-3 FP to target. Target player will draw one fewer card than they normally would on their next turn. This effect is canceled if Solar Crest (The Sun) is also applied to the target while Lunar Sigil is active.

You may play this card on any player, including yourself, before the next round begins.

cards.name: The Sun
cards.short: ACTION: Target draws one more card next round. +3 FP
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Solar Crest*

+3 FP to target. Target can draw an additional card on their next turn. This effect is canceled if Lunar Sigil (The Moon) is also applied to the target while Solar Crest is active.

You may play this card on any player, including yourself, before the next round begins.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.short: ACTION: Can't gain FP next round.
cards.description:
**ACTION**: *Indignation*

Target will not gain any FP on the next round. If Chicanery (The Devil) is used on this card, the targeted player cannot lose any FP instead.

You may play this card on any player, including yourself, before the next round begins.

cards.name: The World
cards.short: REACTION: Redirect certain card's effects.
cards.description:
**REACTION**: *Nexus*

Redirect the targeted card's effects to a different player, including yourself. You may play this card on another World, changing the recipient of the original target's effects. This effect does not work on any cards that can only self-target.

You may play this card on any card played during this round that can target any player, including your own card.
